title: xy and wh appear as 0 during training (CUSTOM DATA)
body:
I am sorry that I have the problem as follows. I checked my data again and again, but I can't find the reason. Could you give some advice?
```
python3 train.py --data data/coco.data --cfg cfg/yolov3.cfg --batch-size 25
```
